## Semantic Version Impact

_Select ONE checkbox to indicate the semver impact of this change. Learn more at https://semver.org/. If multiple selected, major takes priority over minor over patch._

- [ ] **PATCH** - Bug fixes and minor changes (backwards compatible)
- [ ] **MINOR** - New features (backwards compatible)
- [ ] **MAJOR** - Breaking changes (not backwards compatible)

## Scout rule

_Any [code cleaning](https://biratkirat.medium.com/step-8-the-boy-scout-rule-robert-c-martin-uncle-bob-9ac839778385) performed, unrelated to the issue (optional)._

## CheckList

- [ ] PR starts with [_ISSUE_ID_]
- [ ] I have added an entry to the `[Unreleased]` section in `docs/CHANGELOG.md`
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
